snippet.title: Tales Of Seikyu Closed Playtest Reveal - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Find out how you can apply for the upcoming closed alpha playtest of ACE Entertainment and Fireshine Games' charming, yokai-filled farming life sim Tales of Seikyu, as exclusively revealed at the Convergence Showcase. Can you restore a countryside inn to its former glory, forge connections with extraordinary characters, and uncover the hidden wonders of this magical world?

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2340520

#convergenceshow #indiegame
